components.content:
Hi {name},

Thanks for being an early supporter of STUFF! It truly takes a community to build a smarter, safer, and more human marketplace experience. 

Wanted to bump here and let you know that you can claim your username first! :-)

Whether you’re here to buy, sell, or browse cool stuff, or give stuff away, we can’t build this without people like you. Help us help you! 

If you know someone who would dig STUFF— whether it is a local artist, your secondhand fashionista friend, or a buy nothing enthusiast, here’s your unique referral link:
